I wanted to pull together officials from federal and state agencies to help members in our community, especially seniors, learn how to identify, avoid and report scams. https://www.kenoshanews.com/news/local/steil-seeks-to-thwart-scams-robocalls/article_ecd09a5d-980e-595e-aab7-ee74338e3e4a.html#1¬†‚Ä¶

That‚Äôs why I held a workshop in Kenosha to help members in our community, especially seniors, learn how to identify, avoid, and report scams. I invited federal and state officials to share tips on topics including like robocalls, telemarketing scams, identity theft, & debt scams.

Everyone needs the tools to avoid falling victim to scams. More than three million fraud reports costing consumers $1.48 billion were reported last year. It‚Äôs important we continue to work to prevent these crimes and make our community resilient against scammers.
